title: sharavaNabhavaniDam
sahitya:
sharaNam aDai manamE parama krpAkara bhakta paripAlana


anupallavi

  urutuNai tandu unnai parivuDan aNaindu UzhvinaiyAl undan vAzhvu pAzhvurAdu


caraNam    immakhilam tanil inrum enrum nI innalE uTriDAdu inba sukhamuTriDavE
embirAn muruganai iNaiyaTra tuNaiyena nambi vaNangi nI nADum nalamuravE
